name: AstroPrint, Inc.
description: Provider of a 3D printing software platform. The company offers a free, open, cloud platform and application marketplace designed for 3D Printing. Its cloud-based platform allows 3D Printer owners to manage their printers from anywhere around the world.
one_liner: Provider of a 3D printing software platform. The company offers a free, open, cloud platform and application marketplace designed for 3D Printing. Its cloud-based platform allows 3D Printer owners to manage their printers from anywhere around the world.
